name: Rock Paper Scissors Simulation (Scinacz)
description:
What if you took Rock Paper Scissors and made it into a Battle Royale?

THIS is what would happend!

This is a simulation and a learning expirience, you can see what would happend if you would put a bunch of AI and made it fight with Rock Paper Scissors mechanics.

This was a very short project and its a lot of fun to watch, had a lot of great time with it. 

WARNING! This Simulation Might LAG A Lot On Low-End PC's So Be Ware Of How Much AI You Spawn!

Known Bugs/Inconviniences:
-Bad Skybox [FIXED]
-Spawning On Non Reachable Places
-Minimap Bad [FIXED]
-No Ability To Place AI Manually
-No Ability To Destory AI Manually
-Slow Simulation [FIXED]
-Weird Rock Counter

Controls:
-Space[Fly Up]
-Control[Fly Down]
-Shift[Fly Faster]
-WASD[Movement]

Original Idea By Denis From MesoteGames: https://mesotegames.com/
